data.title: Assessment Neighborhood Map
data.text:
General Information

The interactive map is designed to provide Taxing Neighborhood information for the properties within St Joseph County. The map also includes information such as street names, parcel boundaries, and city boundaries. Once the map has been zoomed in, you can click on nearby parcels to obtain their information.

Property Search by Tax ID

Open the magnifying glass icon.

Searching by address will auto fill.

The best way to search is by the county tax identifier (example: 018-3006-0174). Use the drop down arrow next to the search box that appears to select Parcel.

Enter the tax ID in the search box.

Use the magnifying glass. The search will zoom to the property. Each propertyâ€™s neighborhood will be displayed, and property use is color coded according to the legend.

Property Record Card Search
